body: I updated doc to use your wording "second-order gradients". However, note that C++ code does not compute "final" gradients. GradGradOp will return gradient w.r.t. max pooling gradient. Second-order gradient will be correctly handled in backend gradient implementation, such as python.
body_html: I updated doc to use your wording "second-order gradients". However, note that C++ code does not compute "final" gradients. GradGradOp will return gradient w.r.t. max pooling gradient. Second-order gradient will be correctly handled in backend gradient implementation, such as python.
body_text: I updated doc to use your wording "second-order gradients". However, note that C++ code does not compute "final" gradients. GradGradOp will return gradient w.r.t. max pooling gradient. Second-order gradient will be correctly handled in backend gradient implementation, such as python.
